title: Les Palais des Beaux-Arts: Vu du Jardin de l'Exposition Universelle de 1889 (The Palace of Fine Arts: Seen from the Garden of the Universal Exposition of 1889)
marks:
Signature, Title, Inscription and Stamp

LLC on  right edge center, in the print: [A. LEPERE]; LRQ,
description: woman seated on chair, seen from back, LLQ; figures seated and walking on grand steps at center; figures walking at left in middle ground; buildings, sculptures, colonnade in background, with domed building in ULC
